sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_b6ce77b7c399b250b1c8784ed40131fb
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Laptop Request">09d137b3c319b250b1c8784ed401316b</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>SelectItemsMandatory</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {

    var laptop = g_form.getValue('laptop_req') == 'true';
    var document_camera = g_form.getValue('document_camera') == 'true';
    var drawing_tablet = g_form.getValue('drawing_tablet_for_writing_equations_whiteboard') == 'true';
    var headset = g_form.getValue('headset_req') == 'true';
    var second_monitor = g_form.getValue('nd_monitor') == 'true';
    var web_camera = g_form.getValue('web_camera') == 'true';
    var desk_phone = g_form.getValue('desk_phone') == 'true';
    var other = g_form.getValue('others_req') == 'true';

    // check if none are selected
    if (!laptop && !document_camera && !drawing_tablet && !headset &&
        !second_monitor && !web_camera && !desk_phone && !other) {

        alert("Please select at least one equipment option.");
        return false;  // stops submission
    }

    return true; // allow submit
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-11-26 06:34:50</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b6ce77b7c399b250b1c8784ed40131fb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SelectItemsMandatory</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_b6ce77b7c399b250b1c8784ed40131fb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-26 10:22:45</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
